unnormalised: My grandmother swears by Ayurvedic treatments! She's been going to the Arya Vaidya Sala in Kottakkal, Kerala, for years. Remember that back pain she had after Onam, gorging on too much payasam? After a month of Abhyanga and Kizhi there, she was right as rain. Apparently, even my cousin, Rohan, who ran 10 km marathons and injured his knee, found relief there. Maybe I should ditch the gym and try it myself!
normalised: My grandmother swears by Ayurvedic treatments! She's been going to the Arya Vaidya Sala in Kottakkal, Kerala, for years. Remember that back pain she had after Onam, gorging on too much payasam? After a month of Abhyanga and Kizhi there, she was right as rain. Apparently, even my cousin, Rohan, who ran ten kilometer marathons and injured his knee, found relief there. Maybe I should ditch the gym and try it myself!
